name: Lea Thompson (Girl Gone Crypto)
bio: Influencer and content creator in the cryptocurrency industry, Lea helps people go from confused to confident when learning about Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, blockchain technology, web3, and NFT’s. She’s been featured in Bloomberg, The Times, Vice, Time Magazine, NY Post, ELLE, Vogue Business, a Super Bowl 2020 commercial and more. She’s best known for her weekly news recap video called The Crypto Minute.
